job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <strong>Machine Learning Engineer - Python, C++, Julia<br><br></strong>This Jobot Job is hosted by Gene Choi<br><br>Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.<br><br>Salary $150,000 - $200,000 per year<br><br><strong>A Bit About Us<br><br></strong>Based in Boston, MA we use light to create photonic compute chips specialized for AI. We recently secured our Series B funding of $80M.<br><br>If you are a Machine Learning Engineer, then please read on….<br><br><strong><br><br><strong>Why join us?<br><br></strong></strong><ul><li> Competitive Base Salary!</li><li> 401k, PTO, and excellent benefits!</li><li> Accelerated Career Growth!<br></li></ul><strong>Job Details<br><br></strong>Is your background a fit? Apply if you meet this criteria<br><ul><li> Masters or PhD in computer science, electrical engineering, physics, mathematics, or any related field</li><li> Minimum of 5 years experience in software engineering for machine learning applications</li><li> Highly proficient in scientific object-oriented programming languages, e.g. Python, C++, and Julia, with good code hygiene</li><li> Solid understanding of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and neural networks</li><li> Highly experienced in deep learning programming languages and framework, e.g. Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe, MXNet</li><li> Experience programming in CUDA or OpenCL is a plus<br></li></ul>Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
